snippet.title: Another Mind (1998) PSX PS1 Japanese FMV game trailer & opening.
snippet.description: Hitomi Hayama, a 16-year old girl was involved in a car accident. Upon waking in the hospital she realizes that someone else took residence in her head, another mind. In this game with full motion videos and real actors, player takes role of this other mind. What Hitomi faces, the player faces as well. The interaction with Hitomi is done by assembling words and sentences.
